quiz.question: Finish the famous movie quote: "Go ahead, make my ____." (Sudden Impact).

Finish the quote: "They call it a Royale with ____" (Pulp Fiction).

Finish the quote: "To infinity and ____!" (Toy Story).
Finish the quote: "Here's looking at you, kid" — which actor originally improvised this line?
Finish the famous movie quote: "I see dead ____." (The Sixth Sense).
Finish the quote: "You had me at hello" — what does this reveal about the speaker?
